entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
